column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: 30 suspect drug users were detained by anti-drug police  in a crackdown on illegal drug trafficking.------The operation was carried out on December 12
column7: Phnom Penh.------The force confiscated 15 packages meth
column11: 11 motorbikes and a car.------The suspects were sent to the Anti-Narcotics Office for further legal inquiries.  ------TVFB
